name: For Honor - Combat Remake
description:
Here's a prototype of some of the main combat mechanics of For Honor, the objective was to reproduce the gameplay as faithfully as possible!

Controls (also available in game) :

  • WASD / ZQSD / Left Stick : Movement
  • Mouse / Right stick : Camera movement
  • Spacebar / A : Roll/ Dodge
  • Left shift / Left stick button : Sprint
  • Right click (hold) / LT (hold): Guard mode
  • Right click (release) / LT (release): Leave guard mode
  • Mouse / Right stick : Switch guard direction (in guard mode)
  • Left click / RB : Attack
  • Middle click / X : Break guard
